title: El Camino Real de los Tejas National Historic Trail: Old Stone Fort
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     A Photographic Journey of the Trail     A Photographic Journey - Pictures 16-30     Old Stone Fort                  Old Stone Fort        Christopher Talbot       Old Stone Fort, Nacogdoches County, Texas Built by Antonio Gil Y’Barbo as a market or storage area for the town of Nacogdoches, the trading post is located on Old San Antonio Road and La Calle del Norte. This location may have also been associated with the Barr and Davenport Trading Post. The original post was torn down in 1902. The Stone Fort Museum is a replica constructed on the grounds of Stephen F. Austin State University. Time period: 1779–1902 Ownership: Public (Stephen F. Austin State University) A Photographic Journey of the Trail - NEXT IMAGE PREVIOUS IMAGE
